name: HideOut
description:
This is a Game made in a Game Jam.
HideOut is a party game who a IA (Json here)  want to kill everyone in a manson.

The last player in life win the game.

You can punch other player and stunt them.

Open a door make noise that Json can hear and run to see what it is.

Blue wave is a player noise, red wave is the noise that Json make.

2-4Players

Xbox Controller only.

Enjoy :D

Team:
